# GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersion | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersion ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-gameCenterAppVersion)

-  GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersion 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersion

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-gameCenterAppVersion#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersion
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-gameCenterAppVersion#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-gameCenterAppVersion#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppStoreVersionGameCenterAppVersionLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversiongamecenterappversionlinkageresponse)`OK`
